dw:transform-message.doc:name: Create Get Workers Request

wd-hr:get-workers.doc:name: get Workers from Workday Human Resource

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Workers to Cases
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload:
%dw 1.0 %input payload application/java %output application/java %var response = payload as :object { class: "com.workday.hr.GetWorkersResponseType" } --- response.responseData.worker map { SuppliedName : $.workerData.personalData.nameData.legalNameData.nameDetailData.lastName ++ $.workerData.personalData.contactData.emailAddressData[0].emailAddress, SuppliedEmail : $.workerData.personalData.contactData.emailAddressData[0].emailAddress, Status : 'Working', Origin : 'Web', Subject : $.workerData.personalData.nameData.legalNameData.nameDetailData.firstName ++ ' ' ++ $.workerData.personalData.nameData.legalNameData.nameDetailData.lastName ++ ' Case', ExtId__c : $.workerReference.ID[1].value,
orgIds : $.workerData.organizationData.workerOrganizationData map { id : $.organizationData.organizationReferenceID, name : $.organizationData.organizationName, type : $.organizationData.organizationTypeReference.descriptor } filter $.type == 'Supervisory' } unless (response.responseData is :null) otherwise []
